title: Sony LinkBuds Review: New Wireless Earbuds Keep Ears Clear for All-Day Comfort
sub_head: These Bluetooth headphones are easier to wear than AirPods and other buds because you don’t shove them in your ears. Plus, you can hear everything around you—for better or worse.
body:
I love wireless earbuds. I’ve reviewed a lot of different products over the years, from noise-canceling models to affordable options to the latest AirPods. But the in-ear bud style doesn’t suit everyone. Readers often email me saying earbuds cause them ear pain and create an uncomfortable feeling of pressure or suction.
I was drawn to Sony ’s new Bluetooth wireless headphones, called LinkBuds, because of their novel open-ring design, one that addresses some of those issues: They are earbuds minus the buds.
